attributes.action: be impeached over his conduct of handling the financial purse and subsequent premiership
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people, accuse the PM of misconduct during his position as Chancellor and subsequently as PM of our once great country. He has over the years, borrowed and spent far beyond this countries' means and should be held accountable and a general election should be called.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
